item.description:
Hi, Everyone,
Hope you had a great summer! I'm looking forward to the new season - to seeing long-time members and meeting new ones.

It looks like a great theatre season in RI, with classics like Camelot, West Side Story, South Pacific coming to town. Honestly, I could use some Lerner & Loewe after all the avant garde plays we saw last season! But if 1950s musicals aren't your thing, there are plenty of other interesting plays.

To kick off the season, we'll have an informal get-together at Trinity Brewhouse, starting at 7 p.m. You pay for your own dinner and drinks - the stimulating conversation is free. I will also be asking for our annual $7 membership fee. Thanks to those who already paid in the spring, I won't hit you up again until next year. ;-) Everyone is welcome, whether you've just joined or you come to every Meetup.

Hope to see you there!
Nicole
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at hostess stand for RI Theatre Group
item.name: Start-of-season Meetup
